Title: Egypt seeks 17 LNG cargoes for delivery between July and September
Description: Egypt’s state-owned Egyptian Natural gas Holding Co., or EGAS, has issued a tender to buy 17 LNG cargoes for delivery between July and September. The tender closes on June 26.
Author: CK

Title: Egypt receives its first LNG cargo after six years with Hoegh Galleon FSRU’s arrival
Description: Egypt received a reloaded cargo from Spain delivered by the 170,000 m3 Hoegh Galleon floating storage regasification unit today. The vessel’s arrival marks the break of a six-year streak of no LNG receipts in Egypt and the start of its 19-20 month deployment at the Ain Sukhna LNG receiving terminal.
Author: CK

Title: Philippines’ First Gen awards tender for a July LNG cargo to Tokyo Gas
Description: Philippines utility First Gen has awarded a tender to buy one LNG cargo for delivery in July to its 5 mtpa Batangas LNG receiving terminal.
Author: CK
